thread.title: John Lewis hails the rise of the mobile "master shopper"
thread.title_full: John Lewis hails the rise of the mobile "master shopper"

author: Ashley Armstrong
title: John Lewis hails the rise of the mobile "master shopper"
text: John Lewis hails the rise of the mobile "master shopper" Find out how technology is changing your shopping habits and lists and take our quiz John Lewis has hailed the rise of the "master shopper" Photo: Christopher Pledger By Ashley Armstrong , Retail Correspondent 12:02AM BST 16 Oct 2015
